alert.note: Alert for Lee (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 26 at 1:22AM EDT until June 26 at 2:00AM EDT by NWS Knoxville
info.description: The National Weather Service in Morristown has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Claiborne County in east Tennessee... Northwestern Hancock County in east Tennessee... Northeastern Campbell County in east Tennessee... Northeastern Union County in east Tennessee... Southwestern Lee County in southwestern Virginia... * Until 200 AM EDT. * At 122 AM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Carpenter to near Zion Hill, moving southeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... New Tazewell, Tazewell, Harrogate, Jellico, Springdale, Lone Mountain, Howard Quarter, Cumberland Gap, Arthur and Sharps Chapel. This includes Interstate 75 in Tennessee between mile markers 156 and 161. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
